name: Star 3 MIDI Karaoke File
summary: An ST3 file is a compressed .MIDI file used by various computer karaoke programs, such as Star 3 and Real Orchestra. It contains music data in the MIDI format for how the instrumentation of a song is to be played. ST3 files also store the subtitle lyrics for a song, along with the artist and name of the song.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
